about_the_game:
"If you are brave, please help!!"

This is a action game where you play as a female samurai, Tomoko, and save a cursed village.

The year is 7900. A village with a beautiful shrine and nature has been invaded by the Demon King's army.

Driven by fear, the villagers have fled, and now no one is in sight. The villagers want to make the village a safe place to live again.

Tomoko, a beautiful samurai with a spirit rooted in Japanese tradition, decides to fight the Demon King's army to lift the curse on the village and bring hope back to the people.

Armed with a legendary sword and magic, Tomoko faces enemies one after another. Dodge attacks, defeat enemies with your sword, and carefully plan your strategy. When your stamina runs out, the game is over. Defeat formidable enemies!

The thrill of defeating enemies... it's also great for relieving stress.

[How to play]

The current combat system is very basic and simple

* Right click mouse ⇒ dodge Roll

* Left click mouse ⇒ Melee attack

* Click F and R buttons ⇒ Access two ancient magic spells

This game is a small stepping stone to a bigger project to be released next year. It will be a Souls-like video game showcasing our new Vtuber Mochiko.
